changelog.change: Fixes for the Game Timer not resuming correctly when closing the game.
Fixed an issue with the Game Timer not working correctly when quitting to main Menu.
When the tool does not detect the Swirl on a specific number of frames during loading, time is added back to Game Time, and Game Timer is resumed.
Added a new Setting for Maximum number of frames to wait for the Blue Swirl before removing the load time.
Initial Release. Everything works very basically.
